entry.title: Rainbow Robin
entry.summary:
Author: Flowerparrish

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,154Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: There's so many things Tim didn't know before, but it makes sense that men can like men, and women can like women, and that there's even people who don't want to be called men or women at all. Tim doesn't think he's met anyone like this at his parents' parties, or the galas he sometimes attends, and he doesn't know anyone at school well enough to know what other kids might say about any of this. That's fine though; Tim's great at researching things thoroughly and forming his own opinions, and his opinion is that this is super cool.The more he thinks about it, the more he wonders if any of these words applies to him. He's doesn't have any idea about attraction, but his research indicates that he might be too young for that to be easy to figure out. Gender, though, maybe that's something?

entry.title: Catgirls Can Have A Little Theft, As A Treat
entry.summary:
Author: atomicpanda

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 83,960Chapters: 53/?Kudos: 388

Summary: Waking up as a tween catgirl in the DCU, a self insert into Gotham experiences the thrills of the masked nightlife, fails to combat her new urge to steal, and fails to combat her new feline instincts, all while working towards her goal of bringing good music to a Deathworld. Armed with the power of adorableness and also a deck of cards that hold a unique path to Power, Allison "AlleyKat" Kyle may not shake the world, but she sure as heck is going to knock it off the ledge.

entry.title: Little Sparrow
entry.summary:
Author: ihrt

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,024Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 168

Summary: "Maybe it was better that Tim’s parents were never around, if this is the course of his life. If mother and father weren’t there, they couldn’t see the swell of his belly. If they weren’t here, they wouldn’t see him running to the kitchen sink to empty the casserole from his stomach. He knew when it happened, it only needed to be once and despite how he preferred to dress. How he’d forged his parent's signatures and changed his legal name, it still happened. He’d filled the trash can with tests to check, but only after ignoring it for nearly four months." Tim was gonna not mention it to anyone, was going to find another spot once it was too big to hide, and find a hospital to have his child on his own. His parents, his school mates, and no one would ever know. And then the Wayne's aka the bats got involved.

entry.title: o superman, o judge
entry.summary:
Author: slipstream

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,308Chapters: 1/6Kudos: 41

Summary: “Has Robin always been this, uh…” There’s a pause that grows heavier the longer it lingers. “Stoic?” “I dunno,” Kon sighs. “Maybe? I only ever teamed up with him like, twice before the whole ‘Kidworld’ thing, but that was before Superman came back, so there’s a pretty big gap in between.” “I could be wrong, but…” Bart sounds uncharacteristically hesitant, like each word is being slowly pulled out of him. “I think something might have happened to him. Something bad.”(Five rooftop encounters between the third Robin and a Kryptonian, and one that happens deep underground.)

entry.title: Three's a Crowd
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,905Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 125

Summary: Dick and Jason pad away to their room, leaving Tim alone on the couch. They are quiet as they brush their teeth in their en suite. On his side of the bed, Jason smoothly pulls his shirt over his head, dropping it on the floor, and slides under the covers. Dick crawls in next to him. He’s warm. “I think Tim’s jealous,” he sighs, throwing an arm over Jason’s middle and settling in close. Instinctively, Jason’s arm goes around him, calloused fingers skimming down his back. “Jealous,” Jason snorts. “Of what?” “Us.” Jason flashes him a skeptical look. “I’m serious, Jay. Ever since that thing with Bernard didn’t work out… I dunno.” “Well, what are we supposed to do about it?” Dick doesn’t have an answer. Jason sighs and rolls over, his body blanketing Dick’s. “Timmy’s a big boy, he can figure his own shit out. He doesn’t need his brothers meddling in his life.”_____Dick, Jason, and Tim get snowed in while on a ski trip. Dick is worried Tim feels left out.

entry.title: following the thread
entry.summary:
Author: remi_wolf

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,832Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 62

Summary: A lot can change in happen in a year, particularly when someone finally pushes you to indulge yourself, rather than continuing to pander to everyone around you. It certainly helps when your adopted father barges in you and snaps your last nerve. Rather than continuing to live in Gotham, Tzipora decides that she's done with it. She's done with risking her help and risking sepsis with every fight, she's done with dealing with Wayne Enterprises, and she's done with the family that's always acted as though she should ignore everything anyone did wrong to her. As such, she's done. She's leaving. And, well, if it means that Jason's comfortable enough to visit her in the end, that would be nice, too. Sequel to the white threads of fate

entry.title: Give and Take
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,175Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 87

Summary: Tim’s curled himself up on the couch, knees pressed to his chest. Watching Stranger Things with only half-interest. Dick sits down next to him, unsurprised and holding back a sigh when Tim almost immediately shifts to tuck himself against Dick’s side. Around anyone else, Tim wouldn’t be this… touchy. He melts a little into the contact when Dick reciprocates by putting his arm over his shoulders. His fingers lightly brush over Tim’s flank. When he glances down, he can see the way Tim’s eyelids flutter. He counts down in his head toward inevitability._____Dick would do anything for his brothers.

entry.title: The Most Precious Thing
entry.summary:
Author: feelmyheartbeat

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,820Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 121

Summary: At last, a signal, except Damian had reported that there were hostiles too close to their position for them to safely continue on and Tim staggered, barely catching himself on a wall. Dick whipped around to him but Tim couldn’t even wave him off, too busy trying to keep himself from throwing up as the pressure built to outright pain. He forced himself to suck in a breath but the cramp only worsened, rippling across his swollen belly and he bit his lip so damn hard he almost expected blood. A hand came to his elbow but Tim was all at once able to stand on his own strength again, the pressure and the pain alike finally gone. Tim straightened further, realising three sets of eyes were trained on him. He glared, then glared harder as the weight of his belly made him slouch again as the strain on his back got too much. Rubbing a hand against his abdomen to try to soothe the little girl, he was swiftly rewarded with a kick to his rib but he bit his lip really really hard so that not a single one of his brothers would ever know.
